mapper.update: update goodsinfo set gname=#{gname}, tno=#{tno}, price=#{price}, intro=#{intro}, balance=#{balance}, pics=#{pics}, unit=#{unit}, qperied=#{unit}, weight=#{weight}, descr=#{descr} where gno=#{gno}
mapper.select: select gno, gname, g.tno, tname, price, balance, unit, qperied, weight, g.status, intro, pics, descr from goodsinfo g, goodstype t where g.tno = t.tno and gno=#{_parameter}
